channel.title: Cambridge on Shweata's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Cambridge on Shweata's Blog

item.title: Week 12| New iPad and Trip to Cambridge
item.description:
2025-12-15–iPad Day

The week started with a trip to the Oxford Street Apple store. I bought an iPad for myself (Air, M3, Purple, 256 GB). I have been contemplating on getting one for the past year, and I finally convinced myself it was a good investment. I am loving the experience. Hopefully, it will come of good use when I start working on my dissertation next year.

2025-12-16–Cambridge Day 01

0945– Train to Cambridge

I took the morning train from Kingâ€™s Cross to Cambridge for the first time. Despite wasting too much time doing the dishes in the morning, I arrived at the station well ahead of time; I even managed to stop to click a picture!
